section.title: Chorus
section.lyrics: All things bright and beautiful, All creatures great and small, All things wise and wonderful, The Lord God made them all.

section.title: Verse 1
section.lyrics: Each little flower that opens, Each little bird that sings, He made their glowing colours, He made their tiny wings.

section.title: Verse 2
section.lyrics: The purple-headed mountain, The river running by, The sunset and the morning, That brightens up the sky;

section.title: Verse 3
section.lyrics: The cold wind in the winter, The pleasant summer sun, The ripe fruits in the garden, He made them every one;

section.title: Verse 4
section.lyrics: The tall trees in the greenwood, The meadows for our play, The rushes by the water, To gather every day;

section.title: Verse 5
section.lyrics: He gave us eyes to see them, And lips that we might tell How great is God Almighty, Who has made all things well.

song.title: I surrender all
song.author: Judson W. Van DeVenter, Winfield S. Weeden

section.title: Verse 1
section.lyrics: All to Jesus, I surrender, All to Him I freely give I will ever love & serve Him In His presence, daily live.

section.title: Chorus
section.lyrics: I surrender all, I surrender all, All to Thee, my blessed Saviour, I surrender all

section.title: Verse 2
section.lyrics: All to Jesus, I surrender Humbly at his feet I bow, Worldly pleasures all forsaken Take me Jesus, take me now

section.title: Verse 1
Verse 2
Verse 3
Verse 4
section.lyrics: While I draw this fleeting breath, When mine eyes shall close in death, When I soar to worlds unknown, See Thee on Thy judgment throne, Rock of Ages, cleft for me, Let me hide myself in Thee.
